name: No Degens on the Property
description:
A tower defense game where you fight robots You play as old man Winters who just wants to live in his cabin in peace, but the the technological age is catching up to him and won't take no for an answer. You must defend you home and traditional way of living by setting up traps to fight off the forces of mechanical tyranny.

A game for the 2019 Global Game Jam - "What does home mean to you"

Controls

Right Click - Place down object

Left Mouse Click - Fire Gun

Space - Switch Build Object

Use the mouse to look around,  To Build a structure (Shooty Tower or Wall-e wall ) look at the build platform with a hammer on it and right click to place an object in the corresponding lane. 

Credits

Stephen Lane..........Programmer / Designer 

Sean Maguire .........Programmer / Designer

Neil Koons aka "The Zlorngler" ...... Music
